thread.title: Virgil: The Deep State Strikes Back: The Permanent Campaign Against Donald Trump

author: Virgil
title: Virgil: The Deep State Strikes Back: The Permanent Campaign Against Donald Trump
text: The complex of bureaucrats, technocrats, and plutocrats that we call the Deep State is seeking to torpedo Trump and his agenda. The last thing the Deep State wants to see is the DC swamp being drained. To them, itâ€™s home! Last week, their permanent campaign against Trump heated up, and the flashpoint was a dubious dossier that had been floating around for months.
